name: Bullet Life 2010
description: Bullet Life, originally released in 2010, was the very first video game ever designed as a full on 3D Bullet Hell Shooter. Fly through the skies as and blast your way through enemies with a more stratify based shooting system! Use guns, rockets, hover canons, and more and weave through hundreds of bullets!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.5 ghz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel (R) HD Graphics Family DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 74 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The unclear insturctions at first confused me, because i didnt know how to start the game but after looking it up and seeing z and x are the keys to use and not the Enter key, i got to enjoy a wonderful flying bullet hell.
I have no idea what I no idea what I am doing, but the cut scenes are cool and a cool retro electronic soundtrack. Very confused here....
